name: CommunionofSaints
0:
”Alexa open Communion of Saints”
”tell me about another Saint”
”how do you become a Saint”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: communion of saints
des:
Communion of Saints gives information about random Saints and individuals one miracle away from sainthood who are called “Blessed” in the Roman Catholic Church. This includes highlights of their lives, circumstances of their deaths, and beatification or canonization information. Just say, "Alexa, tell me about another saint." You can also ask for references on each Saint to learn more about them, by saying, "Alexa, tell me some references." Also, to learn about the process of becoming a Saint, you can ask, "Alexa, how do you become a Saint?" Saying, "Alexa, help" will tell you what you can do in the Skill, and "Alexa, repeat" will repeat what was spoken.

Currently, information about a little over 150 Saints is available. More Saints will be added over the next few months.

The source of this information is www.catholicsaints.info which was compiled over many years by Terry Jones. Terry had used a number of references for each Saint and some of those are listed in the Alexa App after each Saint’s life is described. Some of those include: 

Book of Saints, by the Monks of Ramsgate
Catholic Encyclopedia, by Michael Ott
Golden Legend
Lives of the Saints, by Father Alban Butler
New Catholic Dictionary
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
